pnp:DataRow.pnp:DataValue: Orange County Convention Center, Orange County, Florida, United States

Get the latest insights and skills from technology leaders and practitioners shaping the future of cloud, data, business intelligence, teamwork, and productivity. Immerse yourself with the latest tools, tech, and experiences that matter, and hear the latest updates and ideas directly from the experts.

ESPC is Europe’s leading online community, providing educational resources and encouraging collaboration.

Each year ESPC gathers SharePoint, Office 365 & Azure experts from around the world in one European location for the largest conference of its kind. 

Our mission – to empower you and the community to professional success.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Note to Administrator: For the icons with text in [brackets], change the text and add links to the resources available in your organization. The Join the Community link is already active and links to a Microsoft resource.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Note to Administrator: Add your organization's training events calendar or resources to this page. If you don't have any scheduled training events or don't need to link to additional training resources, you can delete this page from the navigation.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Make a difference. Become a Champion

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Microsoft provides a free Office 365 Champions Program to support the Champion role worldwide. This program provides an online community, monthly community calls, and content to help drive adoption across a variety of services in Office 365.

This program is open to everyone. We recommend that, at a minimum, anyone running a Champions Program in their organization become a member to get access to Champions Program training materials.  

Sign up today to become a part of the worldwide community at https://aka.ms/O365Champions.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Welcome to the Microsoft 365 learning pathways Admin Success Center. The Admin Success Center provides the guidance and resources to help you plan, customize, drive adoption, and measure the impact of your learning pathways deployment.
